title: How to Delete Twitch Videos: Web & Mobile

steps.title: Login to your Twitch account.
steps.content: Login to your Twitch account. You can use either the desktop app or go to https://twitch.tv .

steps.title: Click your icon image.
steps.content: Click your icon image. You'll see this in the upper right corner of your browser or application window.

steps.title: Click Video Producer.
steps.content: Click Video Producer . You'll see this grouped with "Channel" and "Creator Dashboard." Once you click on this, you'll see a list of all your videos.

steps.title: Click ⋮ next to the video you want to delete.
steps.content: Click ⋮ next to the video you want to delete. A menu will drop-down.

steps.title: Click Delete.
steps.content: Click Delete . This is at the bottom of the menu, next to the trashcan icon.

steps.title: Go to https://twitch.tv in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://twitch.tv in a web browser. You can use any browser you want, including Safari, Chrome, and Firefox. This method includes requesting the desktop version of the site so you can delete videos.

steps.title: Request the desktop version of the site.
steps.content: Request the desktop version of the site. Twitch.tv has it's own option to request the desktop version, which is an option inside the three-dot menu in the upper left corner of the website.

steps.title: Tap your icon image.
steps.content: Tap your icon image. You'll see this in the upper right corner of the browser window. You may need to pinch and pull on the screen to navigate.

steps.title: Tap Video Producer.
steps.content: Tap Video Producer . You'll see this grouped with "Channel" and "Creator Dashboard." Once you click on this, you'll see a list of all your videos.

steps.title: Click ⋮ next to the video you want to delete.
steps.content: Click ⋮ next to the video you want to delete. A menu will drop-down.

steps.title: Click Delete.
steps.content: Click Delete . This is at the bottom of the menu, next to the trashcan icon.
